attributes.action: Get Tim Lovejoy and Gang back on Soccer AM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Soocer AM has lost its sparkle since Tim Lovejoy, Sheephead, Fenners, and gang left, only to be replaced by Andy(Dull) Goldstein and his unfunny friends. We want Soccer AM to be the excellent programme it once was, and Mr Brown being a football fan, please help.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
